CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 17, 1962, pg. 1, reads: "Observe Building Sketch - Lawson and Lawson (left) are seen showing certain officers of the Allegheny Union Baptist Association an architects drawing of the proposed new Aged Ministers and Laymens' Home. Left to right: The Lawson brothers, the Revs. I. B. Lavighn, J. C. Hairston and W. D. Pettet, Moderated of the association. The site for the new building will be announced, with the officers of the association and its auxiliaries, in a subsequent issue of The Courier. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five men, Lawson brothers standing behind architectural rendering of Allegheny Union Baptist Association Aged Ministers' and Laymen's Home, Rev. I. B. Lavighn, Rev. J. C. Hairston, and Rev. W. D. Petett, in church with arched windows
